title: Congresswoman pleads not guilty to federal charges over ICE facility
shortDescription: Congresswoman LaMonica McIver appeared in federal court June 25 to face federal charges after her visit to the Delaney Hall detention center in May.

title: Judicial nominee denies whistleblower allegations
shortDescription: Judicial nominee Emil Bove is facing allegations he encouraged the Trump administration to ignore court orders.

title: Trump US CDC nominee backs vaccines as life-saving
shortDescription: If confirmed, Susan Monarez, a career public health official, will report to U.S. Secretary of Health and Human Services Robert F. Kennedy Jr.

title: Video shows 3 generations of Bidens enjoy ice cream as tourists watch
shortDescription: Three generations of Bidens, including the former president himself, are interrupted by starstruck tourists as they enjoy a sweet treat together.

title: 'We made history.' What NYC Mamdani's win means for Democrats
shortDescription: New York City's Zohran Mamdani delivered a stunning upset that energized progressives and toppled a political dynasty—now comes the Trump backlash.

title: Congressman nominates Trump for Nobel. What he's said about peace prize
shortDescription: Senate hopeful Rep. Buddy Carter of Georgia nominated Trump for Nobel Peace Prize for Iran-Israel ceasefire. He's been nominated before but never won.

title: Why did Trump pull out of the Iran nuclear deal in 2018?
shortDescription: Donald Trump bombed Iran after Israel attacked in pursuit of detroying its nuclear capabilities. Trump ended a nuclear deal with Iran in 2018.

title: Trump announces increase in NATO defense spending
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said NATO members will now pay more for defense spending. He criticized Spain as one country not contributing more.

title: Which NYC mayoral candidates will be on the ballot in November?
shortDescription: With the primaries in the rearview mirror, all eyes are now on the NYC mayoral general election on Nov. 5.

title: Democrats question if Trump's former lawyer should be a judge
shortDescription: Emil Bove works for the Department of Justice. He previously represented Donald Trump in a New York business fraud case.

title: Trump hints at changing name of Defense Department
shortDescription: Trump suggested returning to calling the Defense Department the War Department after the success of bombing Iran.

title: Trump looks to buy icebreaker ships in rush to control arctic
shortDescription: Trump said during a press conference at the NATO summit in the Netherlands that he is negotiating with Finland to buy 15 icebreaker ships.

title: Putin being 'difficult' over Ukraine war, Trump says at NATO meet
shortDescription: President Donald Trump met with Ukrainian leader Volodymyr Zelenskyy at a NATO Summit.

title: Trump: US to meet with Iranian officials after nuclear site bombings
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said during a NATO meeting he planned to meet with Iranian officials after bombing their nuclear military facilities.

title: Former GOP Massachusetts Senator Scott Brown launches Senate bid
shortDescription: Scott Brown, who served as GOP Massachusetts senator and ambassador to New Zealand under Trump’s first term, is running for Senate in New Hampshire.

title: NATO commits to higher spending sought by Trump and mutual defense
shortDescription: While Trump got what he wanted at the brief NATO summit, his allies will be relieved he committed to the fundamental principle of collective defense.

title: JD Vance puts up middle finger at GOP dinner
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance put up the middle finger at a GOP dinner event in Ohio when telling a story about Washington, D.C. residents.

title: Trump and Hegseth downplay Iran damage report
shortDescription: President Donald Trump pushed back on reports indicating the U.S. attack on Iran’s nuclear facilities was not as successful as originally claimed.

title: DOGE staffer with online moniker 'Big Balls' quits White House
shortDescription: DOGE staffer Edward Coristine, whose online nickname was 'Big Balls,' has quit his White House job following Elon Musk's acrimonious split with Trump.

title: Deadly Israel-Iran conflict is now 'over,' Trump declares at NATO
shortDescription: Trump spent his final day at NATO disputing intelligence that said U.S. strikes on Iran's nuke facilities set the country back only by months.

title: Daily Briefing: What NYC means for Democrats
shortDescription: Zohran Mamdani pulls off NYC Democratic mayoral upset. Here is the news to know on Wednesday.

title: Coming soon: big Supreme Court decisions on Trump, porn, religion
shortDescription: The Supreme Court is deciding major cases about the ability to block Trump's policies, religious rights and keeping minors from accessing online porn.
